giftsText:
If you would wish to give us something for our wedding please do not waste your time with overthinking about an adequate gift, but rather make it simple and give us some financial support for the festivities or our honeymoon. 
 If you do consider a physical gift, we would beg you to not give us any household items, since we are luckily already very well equipped.
eveningContributionText: If you would wish to contribute with something particular to the evening program, please reach out to the best man or the maid of honor (contacts below). They will be happy to help you out and organize the evening program according to our liking.
